name: ton-minting
description: Ton collection creation, and deploy nft
author: W3Tools

scripts.build: npx func-js --boc output/contract.cell -C contracts lib/stdlib.fc lib/params.fc lib/op-code.fc
scripts.build-collection: npx func-js --boc output/contract.cell -C contracts lib/stdlib.fc lib/params.fc lib/op-code.fc nft-collection.fc
scripts.build-nft-single: npx func-js --boc output/nft-single.cell -C contracts lib/stdlib.fc lib/params.fc lib/op-code.fc nft-single.fc
scripts.build-nft: npx func-js --boc output/nft.cell -C contracts lib/stdlib.fc lib/params.fc lib/op-code.fc nft.fc
scripts.nest-build-prod: yarn build-nft && yarn build-collection && yarn build-nft-single && nest build
